title: Infrastructure finance companies to post 10%-12% loan growth in FY23: ICRA - Moneycontrol
content:
1. Infrastructure finance companies to post 10%-12% loan growth in FY23: ICRA  Moneycontrol
  2. Growth Slows For Infrastructure Finance In Nbfcs: Icra Report  Mint
  3. Growth slows for Infrastructure finance NBFCs: ICRA  Business Today
  4. ICRA : Growth slows for Infrastructure Finance NBFCs; favorable asset quality and profitability  Indiainfoline

description: As of December 31, infrastructure-focused Non-Banking Financial Companies (NBFC) had given outstanding loans worth Rs 13.8 lakh crore.
